cause.description:
Ever been caught by the Police, Ever been discriminated because you Smoke Pot, Ever wanted to legalize Marijuana, ever wanted to smoke safely without the police, or Smoke peacefully.... Trying to legalize Marijuana would ultimately bring people like us closer.
1. Marijuana has never killed anyone
2. Alcohol and Tobacco are legal, yet they claim the lives of thousands of people per year
3. Marijuana usually brings more people closer together
4. If marijuana were to be legalized, it would generate millions of dollars from taxes to support education, and other programs like health care
5. legalization of marijuana would help cancer and AIDS patients and even other medical conditions
6. legalization of marijuana would dramtically reduce drugdealing of marijuana
cause.name: The Legalization of Marijuana
